titleStmt.title: SII 5.483: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 483. (A.R. No. 188 of 1894). ON BOTH SIDES OF THE ENTRANCE INTO THE SECOND PRAKARA OF THE SAME TEMPLE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti . samastajagadādhāra somakulatilaka madhurāpurimādhava keraḷavaṁśanirmmūlana laṃkādvīpaluṇṭanadvitīyarāma coḷakulaśailakuliśa karṇṇāṭarājavidrāvaṇa kāṭhakakarikūṭapākala vividharipudurggamarddana vīrakaṇṭhakāopālavipina
dāvadahana kāñcīpuravarādhīśvara gaṇapatihariṇaśārddūla nellūrapuraviracitaviraābhiṣeka praṇatarājapratiṣṭāpaka mahārājadhirarāja parameśvaratribhuvanacakravattikaḷ śrīsundarapāṇḍiyadevaṟkku yāṇṭu 9 vatu Iṣavanāyaṟṟu pūrvvapakṣattu pañcamiyum cevvāykkiḻam
aiyum peṟṟa puṇarpūcattu nāḷ ceyaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu kaḷattūrkoṭṭattu tirukkaḻukkuṉṟattu Uṭaiyār tirukkaḻukkuṉṟamuṭaiyanāyanār koyil Ātiśaṇḍeśvaratevarkaṉmikaḷom pāṇṭimaṇṭalattu māṭakkuḷakkiḻ maturaiyil nāyaṉār Irājākkaḷnāyaṉār mutalikaḷil kāmaṉ Aracaṉāṉa Atiyamāṉtevar
kku kāṇi vilaipramāṇam paṇṇikkuṭutta Ivvūr melaittiruvitiyil melciṟakil teṉpārkkellai tiruveṇkāṭuṭaiyāṉ tirunaṉtavaṉattu teṟkil turavil teṉpurivāy Uṭpaṭa vaṭakkum meṟpāṟkkellai nañcai nilam ṉṟi vaṭṭam nattappulam kiḻvarampukku kiḻa
kkum vaṭapārkkellai tamuḻataraiyavatikku teṟkum kiḻpārkkellai tiruviticcevvaikku meṟkum Iṉnāṟpārkkellaikkum naṭuvuppaṭṭa nilamum Iṉnilattil meṉṉokkiṉa maramum kiḻnokkiṉa kiṇaṟum Uṭpaṭa Atikaimāṉtevarcivaliṅgapratiṣṭhai paṇṇukiṟa nāyaṉār poṉṉiṭṭi
śvaramuṭaiyanāyaṉārkku tirukkoyilukkum tirunantavaṉattukkum tirumaṭaiviḷākattukkum Āvatāka viṟṟukkuṭuttu koḷvatāṉa Emmil Icainta vilaipporuḷ Aṉṟāṭu naṭakkum naṟkācu 2 1000 Ikkācu Iraṇṭāyirattukkum vilaikkuṟa viṟṟup poruḷ Aṟak kaikkoṇṭu viṟṟu vilaippiramāṇam paṇṇikkuṭuttom Atikaimā
ṉtevarkku Uṭaiyār tirukkaḻukkuṉṟamuṭaiyanāyaṉār koyil Āticaṇṭecura tevarkaṉmikaḷom Ippaṭikku Ivai Añceḻuttaṉ Eḻutteṉṟum Ippaṭikku Ivai vayirākkiyatevaṉ Eḻuttu Eṉṟum Ivai cimpuḷ Āṇṭār Eḻutteṉṟum Ippaṭikku Īcāṉatevaṉ Eḻuttu Ivai Eṉṉai Āḷuṭaiyāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai toṇṭar
kaḷṉāyaṉār Eḻuttu Eṉṟum Ivai kūttapperumāḷ Oppāṉamaikku tiruciṟṟampalamuṭaiyār Eḻutteṉṟum nāyakar Oppāṉamaikku Ivai tiruciṟṟampalapaṭṭaṉ Eḻutteṉṟum Ivai kālakālapaṭṭaṉ Eḻutteṉṟum Ivai paṉmāheśvarapaṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu Ivai Uruttirapaṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu Ivai civamuttipaṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu Enṟum
Ivai Aṅkaṇappiḷḷai Eḻutteṉṟum Ivai catācivapaṭṭaṉ Eḻutteṉṟum Ivai tillaināyakappaṭṭaṉ Eḻutteṉṟum Ivai tevarkaṉmi poṉṉampalakūttaṉ Eḻuttu Eṉṟum Ippaṭikku Ivai koyilkkaṇakku ĀṉiŪruṭaiyāṉ nāṟpatteṇṇāyiraveḷāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai koyilkaṇakku ĀṉiŪruṭaiyāṉ to
ṇṭarkaṇāyakaveḷaār Eḻutteṉṟum Ivai niyāyattāril vāṇarāyarkkum villavataraiyaṟkum Oppāṉamaikku Ivai Iruṅkoḷaṉ Eḻuttu Eṉṟum Ivai kaṅkaṉ Oppāṉamaikku Ivai poṉṉampalakkūttaṉ Eḻutteṉṟum coḻiyataraiyaṉ Oppāṉamaikku Ivai muḷḷippāṅkiḻāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai kāliṅkarāyaṉ Oppāṉamaikku Ivai
Ivai vikkiramacoḻamuventaveḷāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai nantimaṅkilaṅkaḻāṉ kaṟaikkaṇṭatevaṉ Eḻu
ttu Ivai tiruvaiyāṟupoliyaniṉṟāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai māppūtiperumāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai nallāṟṟuḻā
ṉ Eḻuttu Ivai neṭumāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai kāvūḻāṉ Ammaiappaṉ Eḻuttu Ivai kāvuḻāṉ Eḻuttu Iv
ai nāṟpatteṇṇāyiranampi Eḻuttu Ivai vaṟaiyūr kaṇi Eḻuttu Ivai Irācentiracoḻa nomurnāṭṭuveḷāṉ E
ḻuttu Ivai Āṟṟuḻāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai paṇṭitampākkiḻāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai karuṅkuppai Irājanārāyaṇaṉ muv⌈
ventaveḷāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai Ilaikkāṭukiḻāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai cattamuḻāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai kāraikiḻāṉ Eḻuttu
Ivai kuḷattuḻāṉ vāṉavaṉ muventaveḷāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai cāttuvāyaṉ Eḻuttu Ivai taraiiṟaikiḻāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai Uḻalūrkiḻavaṉ Eḻuttu Ivai peruviḷakkaṉ Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku
Ivai kuḷattuḻāṉ miṉavaṉ pallavaraiyaṉ Eḻuttu Ivai Ilaṭṭur Āṟṟuḻāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai ceṅkalaṅkiḻāṉ tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai ceṅkalaṅkiḻāṉ pirāntakatevaṉa Eḻuttu
Ivai peruntevaṉ Eḻuttu Ivai Araicapurantaraveḷāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai kiḷinallūrkiḻavaṉ Eḻuttu Ivai kuḷattūṟ peruviḷakkaṉ Eḻuttu Ivai kuḷattuḻāṉ vāṉavaṉ pallavaraiyaṉ Eḻuttu
Ivai Arinallūrkiḻavaṉ Eḻuttu Ivai Iḷaṅkaraṉ Eḻuttu Ivai neytalvāyiluṭaiyāṉ pallavāṇṭāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai vaḷavataraiyaṉ Eḻuttu Ivai caṭaiyūrkiḻavaṉ Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku
Ivai kulottuṅkacoḻakkaṭakkaṅkoṇṭāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai cittirameḻik kaṭakkaṅkoṇṭāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai cikāḻināṭaṉ Eḻuttu Ivai paṉmāhecurappiḷḷai Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku
Ivai nāṟpatteṇṇāyirac camaiyamantiri Eḻuttu Ivai nāṟpatteṇṇāyirat tolāṇṭāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai toṇṭaimaṇṭalappiḷḷai Eḻuttu
Ivai kāñcipurattu niyāyattu tirunāṉacampantamārāyaṉ Eḻuttu Ivai Akaḷaṅkamārāyaṉ Eḻuttu Ivai tiruk
kaṟṟālaimārāyaṉ Eḻuttu Ivai paintucelvaṉ Eḻuttu Ivai nellikiḻāṉ Eḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 5.483 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
